description: Get ahead of weeknight dinners and fakeaway dishes with this easy-to-make beef stir-fry, ready to eat in just 25 minutes.
name: Sticky Beef Stir-Fry Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 6 spring onions, trimmed, cut into 6cm lengths (plus extra, thinly sliced, to serve)
4 cm piece ginger, peeled, finely grated

recipeInstructions.text: Combine cornflour and pepper in a bowl. Add beef and toss to coat. Heat a wok over high heat, add 1 tbs oil and swirl to coat. Stir-fry half the beef for 3 minutes or until browned. Transfer to a bowl. Cover to keep warm. Repeat with another 1 tbs oil and remaining beef.
Meanwhile, combine sauces and 2 tbs cold water in a small bowl.
Add remaining oil to wok. Stir-fry onion for 4 minutes or until softened. Add ginger and stir-fry for 1 minute or until fragrant.
Return beef to pan with onion and add sauce mixture, then stir-fry for 2 minutes or until sauce thickens. Top rice with stir-fry, and serve scattered with sesame seeds and extra onion.
